body:
This project derives from kyle conroy's [Journey to the Center of Hawkthorne](https://github.com/kyleconroy/hawkthorne-journey) project.

Where the main project focuses on single player campaign this is multiple projects for multiplayer.

[Lua Server](https://github.com/NimbusBP1729/hawkthorne-server-lua)

[Lua Client](https://github.com/NimbusBP1729/hawkthorne-client-lua)

[Java Client](https://github.com/NimbusBP1729/hawkthorne-client-java)

Java Server will be published sooner or later

[interface](udpMessages.html)

README for people who want to test it out without looking at code
https://dl.dropbox.com/u/13978314/hawkthorne/README.txt
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Multiplayer Hawkthorne
